entry.title: The Pumping Backpack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 88.00

Description
Believe it or not, the BEIS office is no stranger to the whirring sound of a breast pump. We are pretty open about our needs when it comes to how we tote around our stuff and the need to have a place to stash your breast pump was not lost on this team! The genius lies in the fact that this doubles as Mama's work bag, comes with a removable pouch for storing parts, keeping them separate, easy to grab and clean as well as the bonus of not looking like you're carrying around a glorified milk-machine! We've added an insulated compartment in this backpack to easily and safely get that liquid gold from point A to point B.
Specifications
Dims: 14" W x 16" H x 7" D
Materials: Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Jelly PVC (Pouch), Lining: 100% Poly, Hardware: Zinc Alloy
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2.5lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- compartment specifically for your pump ( fit's most pumps)- with a zipper opening
to feed tubes through on the exterior and an opening to feed the power cord through
- padded shoulder straps
- top handles - easy to grab and go
- 4 exterior slip pockets
- trolley sleeve
INTERIOR
- interior zip pocket
- padded laptop sleeve
- 2 interior slip pockets
- comes with water proof zip pouch
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Tote Insert
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 58.00

Description
While our original thoughts when designing this diaper bag insert were for Mums who want all the organization but to still keep their stylish bags - we realized while testing - just how amazing it is for everyone. Especially to keep that tote you're traveling with organized and in a pinch take out the insert and use the tote for shopping, a beach day, and an extra bag on-the-go! Designed to give you the absolute MOST organization, The Tote Insert, has an abundance of pockets, a padded laptop sleeve, our token key fob, a microsuede lined pocket for sunglasses, and a removable insulated bag for milk, snacks, your lunch, or a refreshing beverage.
Shay's Inspo

"I’ve really outdone myself with this one! Can I say that? Meet the Tote Insert. This is perfect for people who like to switch up their bags every now and again, but who don’t want to go through the rigmarole of taking everything out over and over. This bag ensures that all of your essentials are with you no matter what (BÉIS) bag you want to use."-Shay

Details


A POCKET FOR EVERYTHING

With this diaper bag organizer, there are endless ways to create the perfect way to organize all your baby's and your needs.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY

Regardless if you're going on a long trip or from the couch to the counter - this diaper bag insert makes the perfect companion to keep everything organized in your tote and everywhere in between!

ADAPTABLE

Make any tote bag a diaper bag for anyone who loves to have it all together. Padded Laptop Sleeve: 14.25" W x 9.25" H; Fits most 15" laptops

Believe it or not, the BEIS office is no stranger to the whirring sound of a breast pump. We are pretty open about our needs when it comes to how we tote around our stuff and the need to have a place to stash your breast pump was not lost on this team! The genius lies in the fact that this doubles as Mama's work bag, comes with a removable pouch for storing parts, keeping them separate, easy to grab and clean as well as the bonus of not looking like you're carrying around a glorified milk-machine!  Portable Pump Pocket : 8"h x 8"w x 7.5" deep

Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Jelly PVC (Pouch), Lining: 100% Poly Zinc Alloy Hardware

Weight: 4lbs

- exterior zip pocket, exterior side slip pocket - perfect for bottles
INTERIOR
- water resistant zip pocket
- 2 slip pockets
- trolley sleeve
PERFECT FOR

-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Lingerie Packing Cube Set in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

No one wants to be that person whose luggage comes off the carousel with that lone pair of underwear peaking out. This set of packing cubes was designed to prevent that exact type of embarrassment well that and to keep your delicates safely tucked away and easily accessible upon arrival. This 5 piece set was designed to keep your bra cups intact, your dirty and clean underwear separated and the washing of these items when you arrive back home less of a chore.
Shay's Inspo

"Whether you like grannies or something a little lighter in coverage, this set will not only keep you organized while on the go, it also keeps the clean pieces away from the dirty. Light on the unmentionables? These cubes easily double in purpose for other travel essentials." - Shay
Details

5-PIECE SET
Keep your delicates organized
WASH BAG
Easy to unpack & launder 
TO WASH, TO WEAR
Keep dirty & clean items in their place
UNMENTIONABLES
Keep those (wink-wink) items tucked away!
DIMENSIONS
12 x 4 x 9.5

entry.title: The Packing Cubes in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 68.00

Description

Welcome to the secret society of the perfectly organized suitcase! Our 6-piece packing cube set has three packing cubes, a zip pouch and two shoe bags! Helping to keep you organized on your travels.
Shay's Inspo

"The Packing Cubes exist to keep me organized and so I can rest assured that when I’m on the road it’s easier to find certain things because, well, they all have their own place. I want to be confident that my things will be just as organized when I open my bag at my destination as when I originally packed them, and that I can easily find any item quickly without wasting adventure time rummaging for that favorite bikini." - Shay Mitchell
Details

6-PIECE SET
Less time unpacking, more time exploring.
3 PACKING CUBES
Little, big and bigger.
2 SHOE BAGS
But you can totally pack more.
1 ZIP POUCH
Keep the small stuff in check.

entry.title: The Mesh Pouch Trio in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: the mesh pouch trio
Price: 14.00

Description

Too big, too small and jusssttt right! No one, not even you, will be losing all those little bits and bobbles when they are organized in this handy set of three. Made of mesh, so they are just the right amount of see-through and a d-ring that makes them easily clip-able into any BÉIS bag with key leash (hint ALL of them), we are setting you up for organizational success here! The interior of your bag will rejoice!
Shay's Inspo
“ Mostly, I made these to organize my well curated collection of mini hot sauces! ” —Shay
Details

3 POUCHES
Small, medium, large
C-RING
For easy clipping into any BÉIS bag
NYLON MESH
see-through, just a little bit
BRANDED 
For your pleasure

entry.title: The Packing Cubes in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 58.00

Description

Welcome to the secret society of the perfectly organized suitcase! Our 6-piece packing cube set has three packing cubes, a zip pouch and two shoe bags! Helping to keep you organized on your travels.
Specifications

Dims:Small Cube: 9"W x 12"H x 4"D
Medium Cube: 11"W x 15"H x 4"D
Large Cube: 17.5"D x 12.5"W x 4"H
Materials:PVC, Polyester, Nylon Zipper, Mesh
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1.1lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- 6 piece packing cube set (small, medium, large cubes - 1 zip pouch, 2 shoe bags
- black rip-stop nylon with breathable mesh window on cubes
- ID window for labeling - paper labels included
- BÉIS logo embossed faux leather handle on cubes
- water resistant coating on lining for cleaning ease

PERFECT FOR
Travel
Packing Organization
At-home storage
Makes a great gift

entry.title: The Weekender in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Shopping Totes
Price: 98.00

Description

We designed this bag to take the hassle out of packing for the weekend or whichever days you’re away. Seriously, this tote’s easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Plus, the bottom compartment is designed to keep your shoes, toiletries and travel essentials separate—you can even stash a hair dryer in there. Bonus points: there’s a zipper-pocket on the back that becomes a trolley sleeve so it fits over your luggage handle. Say Hello to your new favorite Carry-On Travel Bag.

 
Specifications

Dims: 19"W x 10"D x 16"H
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester, Trim - PVC, Strap - Polyester, Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight : 3.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- durable canvas (beige) OR polyester (black) material featuring easy to wipe clean faux patent trim
- 12" drop partially rolled handle for easy carry
- wire frame double zip opening/closure - opens wide to see inside
- double zip around bottom compartment with water resistant lining
- trolley pass through with zipper - to create pocket when not in use
- external zip pocket for small items (keys, phone, boarding pass, passport, sunnies, lip gloss)
- embossed BÉIS logo on bottom left
INTERIOR
- padded laptop sleeve pocket with velcro strap closure
- large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
- lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
- key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
-Travel
-Luggage Storage
-Protecting your luggage
